languages.text:
A Necron Lord is seated on this ship.
The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}.
On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Aiming Protocol{/g}.
languages.original_text: На этом корабле расположился некронский Лорд. Корабль получает +20% к шансу попадания и +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Маневренности{/g}. Если этот корабль повреждается больше остальных кораблей, Лорд перебирается на другой корабль. В противном случае он действует в соответствии с Протоколом поиска цели.

traits.locale_text: A Necron Lord is seated on this ship. The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 manoeuvrability. On this ship's turn, if it is more damaged than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses Aiming Protocol.

A Necron Lord is seated on this ship. The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 manoeuvrability. On this ship's turn, if it is more damaged than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses Aiming Protocol.

A Necron Lord is seated on this ship. The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses Aiming Protocol.

A Necron Lord is seated on this ship. The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses Aiming Protocol.

languages.text: На этом корабле расположился некронский Лорд. Корабль получает +20% к шансу попадания и +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Маневренности{/g}. Если этот корабль повреждается больше остальных кораблей, Лорд перебирается на другой корабль. В противном случае он действует в соответствии с Протоколом поиска цели.

Ein Lord der Necrons befindet sich auf diesem Schiff.
Das Schiff erhält +20 % Trefferchance und +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g}.
Wenn dieses Schiff in seinem Zug mehr {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} als ein verbündetes Schiff hat, begibt sich der Lord der Necrons auf dieses Schiff. Andernfalls verwendet der Lord der Necrons {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Zielprotokoll{/g}.
languages.original_text:
A Necron Lord is seated on this ship.
The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}.
On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Aiming Protocol{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Ein Lord der Necrons befindet sich auf diesem Schiff. Das Schiff erhält +20% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} und +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}Manövrierbarkeit{/g}. Wenn dieses Schiff in seinem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} mehr Schaden als ein anderes verbündetes Schiff hat, begibt sich der Lord der Necrons auf dieses Schiff. Andernfalls verwendet der Lord der Necrons Zielprotokoll.

languages.text:
Un Dynaste nécron se trouve à bord de ce vaisseau.
Le vaisseau gagne +20 % de chances de toucher et +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}.
Durant le tour de ce vaisseau, s'il est plus {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}endommagé{/g} qu'un autre vaisseau allié, le Dynaste nécron s'y déplace. Sinon, le Dynaste nécron utilise {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Protocole de ciblage{/g}.
languages.original_text:
A Necron Lord is seated on this ship.
The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}.
On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Aiming Protocol{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Un Dynaste Nécron se trouve à bord de ce vaisseau. Le vaisseau gagne +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} et +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manœuvrabilité{/g}. Durant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de ce vaisseau, s'il est plus endommagé qu'un autre vaisseau allié, le Dynaste Nécron s'y déplace. Sinon, le Dynaste Nécron utilise Protocole de Ciblage.

languages.text:
这艘舰船上有一位太空死灵领主。
这艘舰船命中率提高20%，{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}{/g}提高1点。
在这艘舰船的回合中，如果它的受损程度比其他盟军舰船更加严重，则太空死灵领主会转移到新的舰船上，否则太空死灵领主会使用{g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}瞄准协议{/g}。
languages.original_text:
A Necron Lord is seated on this ship.
The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}.
On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Aiming Protocol{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 这艘战舰上有一位太空死灵领主。 这艘舰船{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}提高20%，{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}机动性{/g}提高1点。 在这艘舰船的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，如果这艘舰船的受损程度比其他盟军舰船更加严重，则太空死灵领主会转移到新的舰船上。否则，太空死灵领主会使用瞄准协议。

languages.text:
Hay un Señor Necrón en esta nave.
La nave tiene un +20 % de probabilidad de impacto y +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g}.
En el turno, de esta nave, si ha sufrido más {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daños{/g} que otra nave aliada, el Señor Necrón se traslada a ese nave. De lo contrario, el Señor Necrón usa {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Protocolo de apuntado{/g}.
languages.original_text:
A Necron Lord is seated on this ship.
The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}.
On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Aiming Protocol{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hay un Señor Necrón en esta nave. La nave tiene un +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} y +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}maniobrabilidad{/g}. En el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, de esta nave, si ha sufrido más daños que otra nave aliada, el Señor Necrón se traslada a ese nave. De lo contrario, el Señor Necrón usa Protocolo de apuntado.

languages.text: ネクロン・ロードがこの船に乗っている。 この船は命中率が+20%、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が+1増加する。 この船のターン中、この船が他の味方艦よりも{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けている場合、ネクロン・ロードはその船へと移動する。そうでない場合、ネクロン・ロードは照準プロトコルを使用する。
languages.original_text: A Necron Lord is seated on this ship. The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}. On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses Aiming Protocol.

traits.locale_text: ネクロン・ロードがこの船に乗っている。 この船は命中率が+20%、{g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}操縦性{/g}が+1増加する。 この船のターン中、この船が他の味方艦よりも{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けている場合、ネクロン・ロードはその船へと移動する。そうでない場合、ネクロン・ロードは照準プロトコルを使用する。

languages.text:
Bu gemide bir Nekron Lordu bulunuyor.
Gemi, +%20 vuruş olasılığı ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manevra kabiliyeti{/g} kazanır.
Bu gemi, turunun başlangıcında başka bir dost gemiden daha {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasarlı{/g} durumdaysa Nekron Lordu o gemiye taşınır. Aksi takdirde Nekron Lordu, {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Nişan Protokolü{/g} kabiliyetini kullanır.
languages.original_text:
A Necron Lord is seated on this ship.
The ship gains +20% hit chance and +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ManoeuvrabilitySpace}manoeuvrability{/g}.
On this ship's turn, if it is more {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damaged{/g} than another allied ship, the Necron Lord relocates to that ship. Otherwise, the Necron Lord uses {g|f:ab0832cf9b794ebc81367a27fadec534}Aiming Protocol{/g}.
